Package simulation.ui

Record Class SimulationSummary

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
simulation.ui.SimulationSummary
public record SimulationSummary(double simulationTime, int totalCustomersServed, double averageWaitingTime) extends Record
Immutable summary of a single simulation run.

Contains key statistics such as total simulation time, total customers served, and average waiting time.
